pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-5575R
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 720
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-5675R
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1080 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Evolver is a violent anime fighter with blood and death involved in both gameplay and story elements
